name: GetBoardField
description:
Retrieve a specific field value from a Trello board.

Use this tool to get a specific field value from a Trello board by providing the board ID and the field name.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Trello board to retrieve the field from.

parameters.name: board_field_name
parameters.description: Specify the field name to retrieve from the Trello board. Valid values: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idMemberCreator, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, url.

value_schema.description: The field you'd like to receive. Valid values: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idMemberCreator, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, url.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field you'd like to receive. Valid values: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idMemberCreator, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, url.

value_schema.description: The field you'd like to receive. Valid values: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idMemberCreator, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, url.
